name: Four Corners (polliwoggames)
description:
A 3D platformer game to experiment with new ideas.

Current Features

FeatureImplementedCharacter controller with running and  jumping animationsYesAbility to push objectsYesMove platforms based on specified waypoints along a pathYesAbility to ride and rotate with moving platformsYesDay and night cycleYesAbility to collect itemsYesKeep track of collected itemsYes

Controls

Keyboard/Mouse

  • Spacebar: jump
  • Esc: pause
  • w a s d : move character
  • Mouse: look / Zoom

XBOX Controller

  • "A" button: jump
  • Left Stick: move character
  • Right Stick: look/zoom
